name: Name
no_ongoing_games: Currently, there are no ongoing games. Please join a game.
game_description: The goal of this game is to guess the identity of a person. Every day, a new photo of someone from their younger years will be displayed, and you will need to figure out who it is. A hint will be available to help you, but be careful, using it will cost you half of the points you could earn.
noParties: No parties are currently ongoing, please wait.
